text: The Saskatchewan Roughriders are a Canadian Football League team from Regina, Saskatchewan. The team were created in 1910. They have won 4 Grey Cups, with the most recent championship coming in 2013. They play at Mosaic Stadium. == Other websites == *Official website Category:Canadian football clubs Roughriders Category:1910 establishments in North America Category:1910s establishments in Canada
title: Saskatchewan Roughriders
